channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024080028
item.description:
Report X-2024080028

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED ON THE RADIO FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE OUTBOUND PD 6. RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE. ONCE ON SITE OF THE PACKAGE, RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE WAS A HAZMAT. RESPONDER READ DECISION TREE AND USED THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET TO PROPERLY HANDLE THE PACKAGE.
